## Hi there!

Thank you for stopping by! I'm Vaasuki and I am currently a second year PhD student researching on soil carbon dynamics and underlying biogeochemistry through the lens of global soil data at the University of Florida, Gainesville.

Stop by and checkout some of my research work going forward!
